Name: GridVR
About the game: Enter the dark space of GridVR and experience classic games in gripping VR style. Bring your reaction and creativity to a new level by shooting at objects in shorter periods of time. Shoot flashing fields from all directions and experience all-new classic games like 'Snake' or 'SimonSays'. VR-Grid also stands for a minimalist design to create a certain retro feel in the VR world. This gives the classics the perfect setting. VR-Grid is therefore perfect for VR beginners and arcade fans!

Meta Description: Looking for information on GridVR? Check out the release date (Jan 17, 2017), developer insights from iPOL, and a complete game summary.
